title: District of Columbia Income Tax Calculator

formulas.title: Formula (extracted text)
formulas.raw: DC taxable income: Let income be I, deductions D, credits C (credits applied after tax). Then: Taxable income: \( TI = \max(0,\ I - D) \)

formulas.title: Formula (extracted text)
formulas.raw: Progressive tax (piecewise by brackets): With brackets \( (b_k, r_k) \) where \( b_k \) is the upper bound and \( r_k \) the rate for bracket k, and \( b_0 = 0 \): \( T(TI) = \sum_{k=1}^{n} \big[ \max\big(0, \min(TI,\ b_k) - b_{k-1}\big) \times r_k \big] \) Net tax after credits: \( T_{\text{net}} = \max(0,\ T(TI) - C) \) Effective rate: \( \text{ER} = \frac{T_{\text{net}}}{I} \quad (\text{if } I>0) \)

variables.meaning: property tax (annual or monthly depending on input)
